summary: A content patch for Ace Archery to work with the lorecraft book system.
descriptionHtml:
LORECRAFT
Ace Archery 
CONTENT PLUGIN

REQUIRES Lorecraft 4.0+ by ArcaneSmith
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9959]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9959[/url]

REQUIRES ACE - Archery Module by Athyra
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10037]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10037[/url]

Search SkyrimNexus for \" lorecraft \" to find all released content plugins.

FEATURES

Adds books for long and light arrows as well as special books for 2 epic ACE bows.
Updates to come and more patches based on the changes made to ACE recipes.

INSTALLATION

Install required mods.
The load order should be something like

Lorecraft.esm
Lorecraft - vanilla.esp
ACE - Archery.esp
Lorecraft - Ace Archery.esp

but make sure Lorecraft - Ace Archery loads up after Ace - Archery or the changes to the smithing recipes might not work.


WHAT\'S LORECRAFT?

Check Lorecraft\'s Core page:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9959]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9959[/url]


COMMENTS/BUG REPORT

Just post em in the comments if its about this specific plugin.
author: PlayerTw0
